reference.title: Deleting documents from a folder based on a list

section.indexterm: exportingDeleting documents from a folder based on a list
section.p: When you delete documents using this function the documents are not shown in the folder anymore but can be restored when necessary using the Restore deleted documents function.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: The folder containing the documents being deleted must be selected.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p:
Select:
A folder in the folder list or a folder in the left column of the folder tree.
Delete Documents... from the Delete/Restore Documents based on a list menu of the Utilities menu.
Select the text file containing the names of the documents being deleted in the Select file containing the list of documents being removed window the selected file has to be a pure text file in ANSI encoding, each line of the text file contains the name of a single document
Press the button which opens the selected file

section.title: Results
section.p: The documents are removed from the folder. You can restore the documents using the Restore Deleted Documents function
